item.title: Bernstein upgrades Netflix after blowout earnings, sees more than 20% upside ahead
item.description: There's still more room to run for Netflix after the company's blockbuster fourth-quarter report, according to Bernstein.

item.title: Baird upgrades this cloud communications stock, calling for around 40% upside
item.description: The firm upgraded the cloud communications stock to an outperform from neutral and raised its price target to $160 per share from $115.

item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 closed at a record on Thursday, as President Donald Trump's call for lower rates boosted stocks. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into ...

item.title: The new AI rally is leaving Apple behind, at least for now
item.description: Apple is struggling in January, while the excitement around Stargate is helping to boost other AI-related stocks.

item.title: These are the 2 stocks that will win the most from Trump's AI project Stargate, analysts say
item.description: President Donald Trump's Stargate foray could present a major boon for these technology companies, according to Wall Street.
